unhaus/toll-pony.about-changeling-on-danger: They do? Seems like they’re doing a pretty good job. Fair by me.
unhaus/toll-pony.about-changelings: Oh. Really… what is a changeling?
unhaus/toll-pony.about-changelings#2: I think I saw a few of them actually. Are they evil?
unhaus/toll-pony.about-location: It’s Unhaus. It’s my town – a large building. It’s safe, got food, got community, everything you’d need. Visitors say it’s strange. I wouldn’t know, I grew up here. We had rows of hanged raiders around here back when I was a foal, to scare off raiders. But the mayor wanted to be more open to caravans. So, that’s probably why ponies find it spooky. Their spirits linger.
unhaus/toll-pony.about-self: I’m Summer Intention. Me and my guys there collect a some small fee from traders and give them safe passage for a few miles. Many caravans pass through and not many stay, so we make some caps.
unhaus/toll-pony.about-town-shape: I guess ponies are scared to live separated. It’s unsafe after all. We just build on top each other.
unhaus/toll-pony.ask-about-town-shape: Why is the town one large building?
unhaus/toll-pony.changeling-ans-explain: They are insect ponies, that take the appearance of ponies, and they eat love.
